name: Zizou, Queen & Piafs
description:
In this game, two players fight against each other !

Fortify your position using a variety of building blocks that are at your disposal !

Destroy your foe and its pityful barricades using your trusty slingshot !

Also try to avoid the occasionnnal bird that may fly above.

May the best player win, we all know Zizou is going to win obviously ...

This game was made during the Wonderjam 2022, the theme was "It's not a glitch, it's a feature". We were imposed the styles "physics-based", "versus" and "course".
